intro: Euphrasia ostenfeldii, commonly known as the Ostenfeld's eyebright, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Scrophulariaceae family and is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that range in color from yellow to orange. The plant typically grows in open grasslands and rocky areas, thriving in well-drained soils. It produces numerous erect stems and is known for its medicinal properties, traditionally used to treat eye ailments. Euphrasia ostenfeldii is a herbaceous perennial that blooms from late summer to early autumn.
